source: Rs. 1,000 or 1% of loan whichever is higher
11.0% for up to 5 years, 11.5% for above 5 years
Flexible repayment options, up to 15 years. Moratorium period up to 1 year or course duration (whichever is earlier).
Copies of attested certificates of students evidencing completion of secondary level education, higher secondary education and above as per requirement

An education loan provided by Siddhartha Bank to support students' financial needs for studying abroad. Attractive & competitive interest rate. Personal counseling through the process. Simplified documentation requirements. Quick approval and transparent loan processing. Loan processing available from a wide range of branch networks. Loan remitted directly to educational institutions (Colleges/Universities) after disbursement.
PAN Certificate (Loan amount equal or above 5 million)
